description: On August 20, researcher Maximilian Teodorescu captured a rare photo of two dramatic solar events — a giant tornado of plasma rising 130,000 km and an eruptive prominence spanning 200,000 km. Both were shaped by the sun’s unstable magnetic fields. While the prominence did release a CME, it is not aimed at Earth.
title: Researcher Photographs Giant Solar Tornado and Massive Plasma Eruption at the Same Time

description: Scientists at the University of Minnesota Twin Cities have detected a new plasma wave in Jupiter’s aurora using NASA’s Juno spacecraft. The finding, published in Physical Review Letters, reveals how Jupiter’s magnetic field shapes auroral activity differently from Earth. The study opens new directions for understanding planetary auroras and magnetic field interactions.
title: Researchers Discover New Plasma Wave in Jupiter’s Auroral Skies

description: Rocket Lab reached a key milestone with its 70th Electron rocket launch, successfully sending five secret satellites into orbit on Aug. 23, 2025. The mission, called “Live, Laugh, Launch,” lifted off from New Zealand and ended its live stream early at the request of the undisclosed customer. Rocket Lab now looks ahead to the debut of its larger Neutron rocket later this year.
title: Rocket Lab Launches Five Classified Satellites on 70th Electron Mission

description: An international team of astronomers has detected RBFLOAT, the brightest fast radio burst (FRB) ever recorded, just 130 million light-years away in Ursa Major. Detected by CHIME in March 2025, the powerful radio flash was traced to galaxy NGC-4141. Follow-up imaging with the James Webb Space Telescope revealed a faint stellar source near the burst, possibly linked to a neutron star or magnetar. The discovery offers fresh insight into the origins of FRBs and opens new opportunities for rapid future studies.
title: Astronomers Detect RBFLOAT, Brightest Fast Radio Burst Ever Observed

description: Forza Horizon 6 will reportedly be revealed next month at Tokyo Game Show. According to a recent report, Microsoft and Playground Games are planning to announce the racing game at the convention. Forza Horizon 6 could also be set in Japan, as per a recent leak.
title: Forza Horizon 6 Announcement Reportedly Planned for Next Month at Tokyo Game Show

description: Oppo Find X9 Ultra could go official later this year with upgrades over Find X8 Ultra. A new leak suggests details about the display and cameras of the smartphone. It will allegedly feature a quad rear camera unit. It is expected to feature OLED LTPO panels.
title: Oppo Find X9 Ultra to Be Equipped With 2K Display, Four Rear Cameras, Tipster Claims

description: Samsung has launched the Galaxy A07 4G in Indonesia, featuring a MediaTek Helio G99 chipset, up to 8GB RAM, and 256GB storage. It packs a 5,000mAh battery with 25W fast charging, a 50-megapixel dual rear camera unit, and an 8-megapixel front camera. The phone also carries an IP54 rating for dust and splash resistance. Prices start at IDR 13,99,000 (around Rs. 7,500) for the 4GB+64GB model, with higher variants priced up to IDR 22,99,000 (around Rs. 12,400).
title: Samsung Galaxy A07 4G Launched With 50-Megapixel Camera, 5,000mAh Battery: Price, Specifications

description: Samsung Galaxy Tab S10 Lite has been launched with a 10.9-inch display and Exynos 1380 chipset. It comes in three distinct colour options bundled with an S Pen. It has an 8-megapixel rear camera and an 8,000mAh battery.
title: Samsung Galaxy Tab S10 Lite With Exynos 1380 SoC, 8,000mAh Battery Launched: Specifications

description: Apple is reportedly planning to roll out tools that will let businesses decide if a device can connect to ChatGPT for Enterprise or not. As per the report, the new admin tools will be rolled out as part of the upcoming versions of software updates in September. With this, the Cupertino-based tech giant’s enterprise customers will have more control over whether ChatGPT can connect to their internal data or not.
title: Apple to Add Enterprise Admin Tools to Let Companies Control Employee Access to AI Services: Report

description: Australia’s financial crimes regulator, AUSTRAC, has directed Binance Australia to appoint an external auditor within 28 days after raising concerns about its anti-money laundering and counter-terrorism financing controls. The regulator cited gaps in governance, limited independent review scope, and high staff turnover. AUSTRAC said global crypto exchanges must adapt compliance systems to Australian law, warning that risk controls must reflect business scale and growing digital asset vulnerabilities.
title: Binance Australia Must Conduct Audit Over Anti-Money Laundering Concerns, AUSTRAC Says

description: Lumio Arc 5 projector is a more affordable option than the Arc 7. The device projects images up to 100 inches with 200 ANSI lumens of brightness and runs on a MediaTek MT9630 chipset. It also features a 5W speaker with Dolby Audio. Priced at Rs. 19,999, the Arc 5 is now available on Amazon, where a Rs. 1,500 coupon lowers the price to Rs. 17,499. Buyers can also enjoy up to 10 percent card discounts, no-cost EMI, and cashback offers.
title: Lumio Arc 5 Projector Goes on Sale in India: Price, Availability, Features

description: Vivo Y500 is set to launch soon and the company has revealed the China launch date of the upcoming phone, while also revealing the design and a few specifications of the phone. The handset is expected to succeed this year’s Vivo Y400 5G and last year’s Vivo Y300. The Vivo Y500 will be offered in three colourway, the company has confirmed.
title: Vivo Y500 Launch Date Announced; Company Confirms Presence of 8,200mAh Battery

description: YouTube might be using artificial intelligence (AI) to alter human-created Shorts videos, several content creators have claimed. The YouTubers have complained that the AI-generated effects on their videos were being added without their express consent, and added that the streaming giant did not inform them about adding the said effect.
title: YouTubers Say AI Is Editing Their Shorts Without Consent, YouTube Says ‘Running an Experiment’

description: The Intel Gamer Days Sale is currently live on Amazon with up to 40 percent discount on gaming laptops. The sale started on August 23 and will end on August 31. Shoppers can avail of bank-based discounts in the ongoing sale. Buyers can exchange their old devices to get additional savings on new models.
title: Amazon Intel Gamer Days Sale 2025: Best Deals on Gaming Laptops

description: Flipkart Black is now available in India as the e-commerce platform’s new subscription programme. It has been placed as a more premium membership programme than the company’s VIP subscription. It will offer early access to sale events, provide exclusive discounts and cashbacks on electronics, along with access to customer support on priority.
title: Flipkart Black Membership Programme Launched in India With One-Year YouTube Premium Subscription

description: Spotify will raise prices as it invests in new features and targets 1 billion users, the Financial Times reported on Sunday citing the music streaming provider's Co-President and Chief Business Officer Alex Norstrom.
title: Spotify Flags Price Rises as It Introduces New Services: Report

description: Xiaomi 15T series, expected to succeed the Xiaomi 14T series, could launch soon. Recently, the price of the purported smartphones has leaked online. Now, a tipster has shared the images of the phones, suggesting the design of the upcoming lineup. The specifications of the Xiaomi 15T Pro and 15T have also surfaced online.
title: Xiaomi 15T Series Design Leaked Ahead of Launch; Tipped to Feature 5,500mAh Battery

description: Apple’s upcoming foldable iPhone may feature four cameras, one on the cover display, one inside, and two on the back, including a high-resolution main lens and either a telephoto or an ultrawide shooter. The handset is expected to sport a 5–6-inch cover display and an 8-inch foldable screen. Gurman also notes Apple is in early talks with Google to use Gemini AI for an upgraded Siri.
title: Apple's Foldable iPhone Will Reportedly Feature Four Cameras; Company Said to Consider Gemini AI for Upgraded Siri

description: Slack, the enterprise-focused communication and collaboration platform, introduced a new feature on Monday that will allow users to manage their projects better. Dubbed Slack Lists, or just Lists, the new feature lets team leads create tasks and assign them to users. The feature’s functionality is similar to workflow management platforms such as Trello or Asana.
title: Slack Lists Project Management Feature to Organise Team Workflows Announced, Could Take on Trello

description: SpaceX has postponed the highly anticipated 10th test flight of its Starship megarocket after engineers discovered a glitch in the launch pad’s ground systems. The launch was originally set for Sunday, Aug. 24, from the company’s Starbase facility in South Texas but was halted just 17 minutes before liftoff. The countdown was paused to allow troubleshooting, and the attempt is now rescheduled for Monday, Aug. 25.
title: SpaceX Reschedules Planned Starship Test Flight Launch Due to Equipment Glitch

description: Ubisoft announced The Division 2: Survivors was announced at Gamescom 2025. The mode will be an updated take on the extraction survival experience, the company said. Ubisoft did not share a release date but confirmed Survivors would launch in 2026.
title: Ubisoft Announces The Division 2: Survivors, a 'Survival Extraction Experience' Coming Next Year

description: The crypto market diverged over the weekend, with Bitcoin stabilising near $113,300 after falling below $112,000 on whale selling, and Ethereum hitting a record $4,953 before settling near $4,760. Analysts said Fed Chair Jerome Powell’s Jackson Hole remarks on a potential September rate cut spurred optimism, while heavy ETH withdrawals from exchanges and corporate accumulation by treasury firms supported the rally. Dogecoin showed bullish signs, while XRP stabilised. Ethereum remains positioned to challenge the $5,000 mark.
title: Ethereum Price Hits All-Time High as Bitcoin Steadies Around $113,000

description: Honor X7d is currently listed on a retail website in Bangladesh in Desert Gold, Ocean Cyan, Meteor Silver, and Velvet Black colour options. It is listed with a 6.77-inch display, Snapdragon 685 chipset and a 6,500mAh battery with 35W fast charging support.
title: Honor X7d With Snapdragon 685 SoC, 6,500mAh Battery Listed by Retailer Ahead of Anticipated Debut

description: Realme has teased a new concept phone featuring a massive 15,000mAh battery, with “15000mAh” text shown on its back cover. Unlike most bulky rugged phones, the teaser suggests a relatively slimmer design, though it may not launch commercially soon. The reveal follows an earlier teaser of a “1x000mAh” phone set for August 27. In May, Realme showcased a 10,000mAh concept phone with an ultra-high silicon-content anode battery, 320W fast charging, Mini Diamond architecture, a semi-transparent back, 8.5mm thickness, and 200g weight.
title: Realme Teases 15,000mAh Battery for New Smartphone Ahead of August 27 Event

description: Samsung started rolling out the One UI update for its smart TVs in October 2024. First offered on its smartphones, the company is now bringing the user interface to its Wi-Fi-enabled smart home appliances, like Samsung refrigerators and washing machines. The devices could start getting the soon. With this, the company aims to offer a unified user experience across its devices. On top of this, the company has also announced it will showcase AI Home features at IFA 2025.
title: Samsung's One UI With Seven Years of Software Updates to Arrive on Home Appliances

description: The Google Phone app got a makeover recently. It merges Favourites and Recents into a single Home tab, moving the Keypad to its own section with rounded buttons, and introducing pill-shaped controls on the call screen. If you're not a fan of the redesign, there’s a simple trick to roll back.
title: Google Phone App Updated With Major Visual Overhaul: Here’s a Simple Way to Bring Back the Older Layout

description: Google Drive recently added the video transcription feature for users, which allows them to view and search for captions for a particular recording. In an attempt to make the cloud storage service more video-friendly, the US-based tech giant has now integrated a new feature called Google Vids into the Drive. This new functionality will allow people to edit clips and add music and text to a video, without having to leave a web browser.
title: Google Vids Allows Users to Edit Videos Directly via Google Drive Website

description: The Lava Play Ultra and Redmi 15 have been recently launched in India and pack some interesting features and specifications. Both handsets come loaded with a premium design and offer a large display. Both models also feature powerful processors from MediaTek and Qualcomm, respectively. Check out the Lava Play Ultra vs Redmi 15 comparison to know the difference between their prices in India, features, specifications and more.
title: Lava Play Ultra 5G vs Redmi 15 5G: Price in India, Features and Specifications Compared

description: Airtel subscribers were unable to make or receive calls on Sunday (August 24) in a few cities in India. This was the second time that the telecom service provider (TSP) was witnessing a network outage in the country, after several users complained last week of not being able to make calls or send text messages. While the earlier service disruption affected users in several regions, the latest one was primarily contained within a few cities.
title: Airtel Restores Service in Several Areas Including Bengaluru, Kolkata, Chennai After Second Outage in a Week

description: Assassin's Creed Mirage will get a new expansion later this year, Ubisoft has announced. The free DLC will add a new story chapter, a new location, and gameplay improvements. Mirage was released on PC and consoles in 2023, followed by an iPhone and iPad port in 2024.
title: Assassin's Creed Mirage Is Getting a Free DLC With New Story Chapter and Arabian Location This Year

description: Meta, on Saturday, announced a partnership with the artificial intelligence (AI) research lab Midjourney. As part of the collaboration, the research teams of both companies will work together to bring Midjourney’s expertise in AI-powered image and video generation to Meta’s models. The company also highlighted that it will be licensing the research lab’s technologies for its future AI models.
title: Meta Partners With Midjourney to Bring Its Image and Video Generation Tools to Meta AI Models

description: OnePlus Pad 3 will go on sale in India next month via its official website, according to the company. The price of the tablet will likely be revealed on the same day. It will be offered in 12GB + 256GB and 16GB + 512GB configurations. Launched in June alongside the OnePlus 13s, the tablet features a Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset, a 12,140mAh battery, and a 13.2-inch 3.4K LCD screen with up to 144Hz refresh rate and TÜV Rheinland Eye Care 4.0 certification.
title: OnePlus Pad 3 India Launch Date Announced; to Be Available in Frosted Silver and Storm Blue Colourways

description: Oppo F31 series, comprising the Oppo F31, Oppo F31 Pro, and Oppo F31 Pro+, is expected to launch soon. Ahead of any official announcement, renders and specifications of the upcoming smartphones have surfaced online. All three Oppo F31 series models are tipped to come with a 7,000mAh battery. Here's everything you need to know about the Oppo F31 lineup's specifications and design, ahead of their debut.
title: Oppo F31, Oppo F31 Pro and Oppo F31 Pro+ Design Spotted in Leaked Renders; Tipped to Feature 7,000mAh Battery

description: Winzo, an Indian gaming platform, launched a short video platform on Sunday, just days after shutting down its real-money games amid the Indian government’s blanket ban. The company also announced its foray into the US market and said that it will bring Indian gaming innovation to global audiences. Interestingly, Winzo plans to bring its entire catalogue of e-sports and social games to the US, given that the country does not ban real-money games.
title: Winzo Launches Short Video Platform Zo TV, Expands to US After Shutting Down Real-Money Games in India

description: Samsung Galaxy A17 5G is now available in the UK, with an Exynos 1330 chipset, a 6.7-inch 90Hz Super AMOLED display, a 5,000mAh battery with 25W charging, a 50-megapixel dual rear camera unit, and a 13-megapixel front camera. The recently launched Samsung Galaxy A17 5G is sold in Black, Blue, and Grey, and the handset expected to launch in India soon.
title: Samsung Galaxy A17 5G Goes on Sale in the UK Ahead of Imminent Launch in India

description: Apple is reportedly planning a three-year overhaul to reinvent the iPhone lineup, which begins this September. As per the report, the Cupertino-based tech giant is planning to introduce two new smartphone form factors in 2025 and 2026, and then redesign the existing lineup on the 20th anniversary of the iPhone.
title: Apple Reportedly Plans to Ditch Current iPhone Design for a Curved-Glass Look in 2027

description: The Galaxy Watch 8 Classic is available in India starting at Rs. 50,999, and is a solid everyday smartwatch. The timeless, rounded design, accompanied by a physical bezel, is a welcome addition, enhancing the premium character of the watch. Samsung offers a range of health and fitness tracking options worth trying. If you already own a Samsung phone, the Galaxy Watch 8 Classic can be a great companion.
title: Samsung Galaxy Watch 8 Classic Review: The Watch That Does It All and Looks Good Doing It
